mapper.select: SELECT tel.id, tel.task_info_id AS taskInfoId, tel.executor, , tel.excute_status AS excuteStatus, tel.create_time AS createTime , ti.name AS taskName, ti.platform, ti.module, ti.task_type AS taskType , li.name AS linkName, li.link , ci.contentTitle, ci.content FROM task_excute_log tel LEFT JOIN task_info ti ON tel.task_info_id = ti.id LEFT JOIN link_info li ON tel.task_info_id = li.task_info_id LEFT JOIN content_info ci ON tel.task_info_id = ci.task_info_id
